headline: Shapiro Announces Expansion of LETI Program
author: Tory Gates

WHLM/WBWX FCC Applications
State Attorney General Josh Shapiro appeared in Snyder County Wednesday, to announce the expansion of drug treatment programs in the region.
LETI allows Pennsylvanians seeking treatment for drug addiction to use local law enforcement as a resource to contact treatment partners without threat of arrest.
Speaking in Selinsgrove, Shapiro announced the expansion of the Law Enforcement Treatment Initiative.
